synopsis:
Our boy Diz just can’t seem to figure it out. He has a job interview on the same day that the Union Jordan IV's release.  Through a comedy of error’s he is on the brink of failing this job interview, when an interesting proposition is presented…a potential trade?  Let’s see where his priorities are at? 

(Source: UNION Los Angeles)

title.en: It Was A Good Day: Hustle and Motivate
